name: Hug Your Neighbors
description:
The very first game I've ever created. You play as Frank; an eccentric fellow who wakes up one day and decides to hug people in his birthday suit.

 I built this game to familiarize myself a little bit with coding (movement, and some simple ai and collisions), and to draw sprite assets and use them. This is also the first time I've ever drawn pixel art.

The goal is to hug as many as possible, but I've never gotten to 100 without cheating.
